name: A Drop of Duality
description:
You are a cute baby tiger falling from the sky! Avoid obstacles and make it to the bottom. But something is off - every level seems to have two dimensions. Maybe switching between them can help you make it to the end? 

And remember, cats always land on their feet!

Controls:

A and D / Left and Right Arrow Keys for movement

SPACE to switch dimension

Credits:

Brandon Sparks: 3D environmental art

Nathan Kingston: Programming
Ibrahim Anjorin: Level design and programming

Special thanks to Lee Beever and Ralph Ferneyhough
